titleStmt.title: A nevv paire of spectacles of the old fashion, for the Scots Commissioners to helpe their eye-sight, when they are returned to the Parliament at Edenburgh. To give account of their protest against and demands of, the Parliament of England. March 5. 1648. Imprimatur Theodore Jennings.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert Ibbitson in Smithfield near the Queens-head Tavern,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
